snippet: MARGULES--Hans. Talented artist and Holocaust survivor. Born in Berlin on May 5, 1918, died in Munich on February 15, 2016. Long-time resident of New York City and New Jersey. Survived by his loving wife Karin; sons David and Tom (Julie); granddaughter Leah; brother Peter (Sonja); niece Jackie Pollen and former wife Barbara Rothholz. Interment will be in Munich. 1/3
lead_paragraph: MARGULES--Hans. Talented artist and Holocaust survivor. Born in Berlin on May 5, 1918, died in Munich on February 15, 2016. Long-time resident of New York City and New Jersey. Survived by his loving wife Karin; sons David and Tom (Julie); granddaughter Leah; brother Peter (Sonja); niece Jackie Pollen and former wife Barbara Rothholz. Interment will be in Munich. 1/3
